title: WTB/WTTF T206 Cobb Bat Off Shoulder Poor-Fair scans of trade bait included
author: frankh8147

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF T206 Cobb Bat Off Shoulder Poor-Fair scans of trade bait included
posts.post_content:
Happy weekend everyone, I am looking for a poor condition Ty Cobb T206 Bat off Shoulder.  I could buy it outright if the price is right or can do a mix of trade and cash and trade severely in your favor.  If you have one, send me a message and i'll try to get something going.  A list of cards I have to trade is below.  Thanks!



1941 Playball Ted Williams BGS 3.5
1939-49 Exhibits Ted Williams #9 shows PSA 2 MK..looks really, really good for a PSA 2 MK
T202 Mathewson Meyers Pr-Fr slight paper loss on back but looks better
1920 W-522 Christy Mathewson-once graded BGS Authentic (even if it weren't trimmed, it would still be poor)
1921 W551 Walter Johnson- looks great but would grade PSA AUTHENTIC due to a messed up left side of the card
Exhibit Salutation Dimaggio EX+, Jimmy Foxx VG, Mel Ott pr-fr, Hank Greenberg rarer variation-Poor
1951 Bowman Ted Williams (ungraded, prob would grade a 2). 
1943 M@P co Joe Dimaggio (Poor)
Two different 1937 Wheaties Dimaggio panels (one VG, one Fair)
1941 Playball Jimmy Foxx- fair-good
1954-55 Spic and Span Hank Aaron
1956 Topps Hank Aaron vg
As per my other post-I am also looking for a babe Ruth #144; either would make my weekend splendid- thanks again!
